entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 06 March 2023
